name: Spaceship Runner
description:
A small spaceship endless runner game that was made in 2 weeks for the game jam: https://itch.io/jam/32bit-spring-cleaning-2022

You can jump and flip upside down. While you are flipped the gravity is also flipped, meaning you are going to fall upwards.

Jump - Space

Flip - X

The code to this game is opensource: https://github.com/Drabbity/spaceship-runner
